----------------------------------


Total Recall is an action thriller about reality and memory, inspired again at the famous short story "We Can Remember It For You Wholesale" by Philip K. Dick. Welcome to Rekall, a company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For a factory worker named Douglas Quaid (Colin Farrell), despite having a beautiful wife (Kate Beckinsale) who loves the words "mental journey" sounds like the perfect vacation frustrating life - real memories of life as a super spy can be exactly what he needs. But when the procedure goes wrong, Quaid becomes a wanted man. Finding himself on the run from the police - controlled by Chancellor Cohaagen (Bryan Cranston), the leader of the free world - Quaid account with the help of a revolutionary fighter (Jessica Biel) to find the head of the underground resistance (Bill Nighy) and stop Cohaagen. The line between fantasy and reality becomes distorted and the fate of his world is in the balance as Quaid discovers his true identity, his true love and his true destiny.
